name: Zevia PBC
description: Zevia PBC is a leading beverage company dedicated to providing healthier alternatives to traditional sugary drinks. Founded in 2007, Zevia specializes in producing zero-calorie, flavored beverages that are sweetened with stevia, a natural plant-based sweetener. The company's mission is to promote a healthier lifestyle by offering a diverse range of beverages, including sodas, energy drinks, teas, and sparkling water, all free from artificial ingredients and sugar. Zevia's commitment to health and sustainability has resonated with consumers who are increasingly looking for better-for-you options in their diets. The brand has garnered a loyal customer base and expanded its presence in retail and online markets. Zevia is also focused on environmental sustainability, utilizing recyclable packaging and striving for a reduced carbon footprint in its operations. The company continues to innovate by introducing new flavors and product lines, ensuring that it meets the evolving tastes and preferences of its consumers. With a vision to enhance the beverage industry, Zevia aims to inspire individuals to make healthier choices without sacrificing taste.
